title: Looking for pals!
body:
Anyone who wants to chill, kick back and play some league & other games with a new group this is the thread for you! 
Simply add bjosh on league and chuck me a message and we'll start playing immediately.

Cant wait to play with ya!

replies.body: I'll be your 'pal', always looking for new pals to farm chests with in norms etc. :)

ohmigosh did someone say pals!?!?! :D

Yes let's be pals!!!! :D Hi, Add me and I'll be your pal! I love pals! The more pals the better, hehehe! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
